item.title: What it Means to Dream
item.description:
The Possibilities of Dreams

I could rehash scientific theories until I am blue in the face, but that is not what this post is about. Instead, I would like to share my thoughts and experiences on dreams.Since a life altering event during a time of homelessness in 2021, I have experienced dreams differently than I had before. I rarely have dreams of which I consider are my own (meaning people, events and setting are familiar). I no longer dream of my life. The events that transpire in my dreams happen in another time and place. The languages of each dream are of a tongue I have never heard, but do understand. The technologies are oftentimes nearly impossible to discribe, as though the place where I am, at the time, does not follow the laws of physics as we know them today.
